name: Spotify
description: Spotify service for music streaming integration

spotify.skip_track.name: Skip Current Track
spotify.skip_track.description: Skips to the next track in the user's current playback

spotify.pause_resume_playback.name: Pause / Resume Playback
spotify.pause_resume_playback.description: Toggles playback pause or resume depending on current state

spotify.add_song_to_playlist.name: Add Song to Playlist
spotify.add_song_to_playlist.description: Adds the current or specified track to a chosen playlist (or to Liked Songs if no playlist specified)

playlist_id.label: Playlist ID (optional, adds to Liked Songs if empty)

track_uri.label: Track URI (optional, uses currently playing track if empty)

spotify.play_specific_track.name: Play Specific Track
spotify.play_specific_track.description: Starts playback of a given track or playlist URI

uri.label: Spotify URI (track, album, playlist, or artist)

device_id.label: Device ID (optional, uses active device if empty)

spotify.set_volume.name: Set Volume
spotify.set_volume.description: Adjusts the playback volume to a specified level

device_id.label: Device ID (optional, uses active device if empty)

playlist_id.description: The ID of the playlist the track was added to (null if added to Liked Songs)

added_to_liked.description: Whether the track was added to Liked Songs

track_uri.description: The URI of the track that was added

device_id.description: The device ID used for playback

volume_percent.description: The volume level that was set
